metadata.title: CVE-2022-27664 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
In net/http in Go before 1.18.6 and 1.19.x before 1.19.1, attackers cancause a denial of service because an HTTP/2 connection can hang duringclosing if shutdown were preempted by a fatal error.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27664` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-golang-x-net-dev - 0.7.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-net package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.0+dfsg-1').
google-guest-agent package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
